name: ACW Circular Walk 02X (eXtra to visit Berkeswell Windmill)

ai.summary: A very short circular walk (0.8 km) around the Berkeswell Windmill area in the UK. Easy and suitable for families, offering rural scenery and a quick windmill visit.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently undulating paths with a mix of tarmac, compact gravel, and grassy lanes. Generally easy, with possible muddy patches after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on designated paths and watch for passing traffic on country lanes. Windmill access may be restricted; respect signs and private property. Check the weather and wear appropriate footwear. Bring water, a phone, and be mindful of livestock and uneven ground.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate clothing and footwear.

seo.title: ACW Circular Walk 02X: Easy 0.8 km Hike to Berkeswell Windmill in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the easy 0.8 km ACW Circular Walk 02X near Berkeswell Windmill in the UK. Ideal for families and casual walkers with flat terrain and rural scenery.
